get.description: Returns the account's information based on the API key used in the header.
List all assignments.

post.description:
Create a new assignment.

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| score_set | Yes | String | Score Set slug |
| entries | Yes | Array | List of Entry slugs |
| judges | Yes | Array | List of Judge slugs |
| rounds | Yes | Array | List of Round slugs |

get.description: Returns an assignment identified by it's slug.

put.description:

| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| judge | Yes | String | Judge slug |
| score_set | No | String | Score Set slug |

parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
Column name to order by. The following options are available:
- created
- entry
- order
- tab
- updated

parameters.name: x-api-language
parameters.description: Defines the languages to include in the response.

get.description: Returns a list of attachments.
Returns an attachment by its token. The response consists of all attachment fields. Files include a download link.

put.description:
Update an existing attachment.  
Please note that attachment fields are linked to the attachment and shouldn't be confused with form fields.  
If you don't have attachment fields you can remove this object from the body of your request.

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| attachment_fields | No | array | Object containing key / value pairs. Where the key is the Field slug. e.g. "fJkIjGmB": "Test value" |
| order | No | Integer | Attachment order |
| tab | No | Array | Tab slug |

post.description:
Upload an attachment to an entry by its tab.  
Please note that attachment fields are linked to the attachment and shouldn't be confused with form fields.  
If you don't have attachment fields you can remove this object from the body of your request.

get.description: Returns a list of categories.

post.description:
Create a new category. | Parameter | Required | Type | Description | | --------- | -------- | ---- | ----------- | | season | Yes | String | Season slug | | status | Yes | String | One of the following values:
  • active
  • inactive
| | translated | Yes | Array | Array of key / value pairs where keys can be any of the following:
  • name (Required)
  • description
  • entry_name_label
  • image_heading
  • packing_slip_instructions
  • shortcode
Values are themselves of type Array containing key / value pairs where the key can be any existing and enabled language code. | | chapters | No | Array | Array of Chapter slugs | | divisions | No | Integer | Number of divisions | | entrant_max_entries | No | Integer | Number of max entries per Entrant | | fill_entry_name | No | Boolean | Determines whether to prefill the entry name field on the entry from when that category is selected | | max_image_width | No | Integer | Maximum image width | | form | No | String | Form slug | | parent | No | String | Parent Category slug | | pdf_packing_slip | No | Boolean | Determines whether or not to generate a PDF packing slip |

get.description: Returns a category by its slug. The response consists of all category fields. Images include a download link.

put.description:
Update an existing category. | Parameter | Required | Type | Description | | --------- | -------- | ---- | ----------- | | season | No | String | Season slug | | status | No | String | One of the following values:
  • active
  • inactive
| | translated | No| Array | Array of key / value pairs where keys can be any of the following:
  • name
  • description
  • entry_name_label
  • image_heading
  • packing_slip_instructions
  • shortcode
Values are themselves of type Array containing key / value pairs where the key can be any existing and enabled language code. | | chapters | No | Array | Array of Chapter slugs | | divisions | No | Integer | Number of divisions | | entrant_max_entries | No | Integer | Number of max entries per Entrant | | fill_entry_name | No | Boolean | Determines whether to prefill the entry name field on the entry from when that category is selected. | | max_image_width | No | Integer | Maximum image width | | parent | No | String | Parent Category slug | | pdf_packing_slip | No | Boolean | Determines whether or not to generate a PDF packing slip |

- submitted


- in_progress


- resubmission_required


- resubmitted | | moderation_status | No | String | One of the following values:

- approved


- undecided


- rejected | | entry_fields | No | Object | Object containing key / value pairs. Where the key is the Field slug.
e.g. "fJkIjGmB": "Test value" | | custom_deadline | No | Date | Date with format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm |

get.description: Returns a list of users.

post.description:
Create a new user. | Parameter | Required | Type | Description | | --------- | -------- | ---- | ----------- | | first_name | Yes | String | User's first name | | last_name | Yes | String | User's last name | | password | Yes | String | Password for accessing the account | | email | Yes (if mobile is not set) | String | User's email address | | mobile | Yes (if email is not set) | String | User's mobile number | | roles | No | Array | Array of Role slugs | | preferences | No | Object | Object containing key / value pairs where keys can be any of the following:
  • broadcast_emails
  • notification_emails
  • notification_sms
Values are of type Boolean | | user_fields | No | Object | Object containing key / value pairs. Where the key is the Field slug. e.g. "fJkIjGmB": "Test value" |

get.description: Returns a user by its email. The response consists of all user fields including files. Files include a download link.
Returns a user by its slug. The response consists of all user fields including files. Files include a download link.

put.description:
Update an existing user. | Parameter | Required | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | first_name | No | String | User's first name | | last_name | No | String | User's last name | | password | No | String | Password for accessing the account | | email | No | String | User's email address | | mobile | No | String | User's mobile number | | roles | No | Array | Array of Role slugs | | preferences | No | Object | Object containing key / value pairs where keys can be any of the following:

- broadcast_emails

- notification_emails

- notification_sms

Values are of type Boolean | | user_fields | No | Object | Object containing key / value pairs. Where the key is the Field slug. e.g. "fJkIjGmB": "Test value" |

post.description: Upload a file to a user file field.

get.description: Returns an auth token for a given user. The response consists of a token that allows the user to log into the app using SSO. To learn more about this please refer to [Creating your own SSO integration in Award Force](https://support.awardforce.com/hc/en-us/articles/360002282716-Creating-your-own-SSO-integration) or [Creating your own SSO integration in Good Grants](https://help.goodgrants.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360002287675-Creating-your-own-SSO-integration).

get.description: Returns a list of webhooks.

post.description:
Create a new webhook.

**Supported webhook triggers:**

- allocation_created
    
- allocation_payment_created
    
- allocation_payment_deleted
    
- allocation_payment_status_changed
    
- allocation_payment_updated
    
- assignment_completed
    
- assignment_created
    
- collaborator_invited
    
- document_created
    
- document_deleted
    
- document_updated
    
- entry_created
    
- entry_eligible
    
- entry_ineligible
    
- entry_moderated
    
- entry_resubmitted
    
- entry_submitted
    
- entry_tagged
    
- entry_updated
    
- field_value_updated
    
- membership_registered (User created)
    
- payment_pending
    
- payment_success
    
- review_task_created
    
- review_task_submitted
    
- role_granted
    
- user_updated
    

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| method | Yes | String | HTTP supported methods ("get"/"post") |
| name | Yes | String | Name of the webhook |
| url | Yes | String | URL for the webhook |
| signing_key | No | String | Requests will be signed using this key and you can use it to validate the webhook payload. |
| events | Yes | Array | List of events will trigger the webhook. Example: \['role_granted', 'allocation_created'\] |

get.description: Returns a webhook by its slug.

put.description:
Update events, name and method of an existing webhook.

| Parameter | Required | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| method | No | String | HTTP supported methods ("get"/"post") |
| name | No | String | Name of the webhook |
| url | No | String | URL for the webhook |
| signing_key | No | String | Requests will be signed using this key and you can use it to validate the webhook payload. |
| events | No | Array | List of events will trigger the webhook. Example: \['role_granted', 'allocation_created'\] |
